menuitem.name: Región _editable
menuitem.enabled: (dw.getActiveWindow(true) != null && dw.getActiveWindow(true).allowsEdits()) && dw.getFocus() != 'browser' && dw.getDocumentDOM() != null && dw.getDocumentDOM().getParseMode() == 'html' && dw.canSaveDocumentAsTemplate(dw.getDocumentDOM())

menuitem.name: Región _opcional
menuitem.enabled: (dw.getActiveWindow(true) != null && dw.getActiveWindow(true).allowsEdits()) && dw.getFocus() != 'browser' && dw.getDocumentDOM() != null && dw.getDocumentDOM().getParseMode() == 'html' && dw.canSaveDocumentAsTemplate(dw.getDocumentDOM())
